title: German-Born U.S. Soccer Coach Flusters Fans With Charm And Menace
teaser: German-born coach Jurgen Klinsmann is leading the U.S. soccer team into the World Cup this week. Sam Borden recently profiled Klinsmann for The New York Times, and Borden explains how the European-American hybrid may help the team advance.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
